entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
